entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
